days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Most charming and saintly Physician, you were animated by the heavenly Spirit of Love.
In faithfully describing the humanity of Our Lord Jesus Christ, you also showed His divinity and His genuine compassion for all human beings.
Inspire me and those I pray for with your professionalism and with the divine compassion for those we serve.
Remember especially my intention in this novena (mention your request here…)
May the Holy Spirit help me to understand Christ’s words and faithfully apply them in my life.
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our FatherHail MaryGlory Be St Luke the Evangelist, pray for us!
